item.description:
Let's join with another meetup at Sacco's, Davis Square Somerville.

http://flatbreadcompany.com/FlatbreadDirectionsSomerville%20MA%202010.html

Sacco's has a huge bar counter, more like a beer hall! But there is also ample space to be seated at tables and consume fabulous pizza made from real brick ovens.

We (our group) might take off afterwards to another location, if there is enough interest, Monday being a holiday! (Possibilities include the Burren and the Rosebud bar).

The other group attending Sacco's is a bicycle group cross-posted to Social Fun and the World is our Playground at 4 PM (which I am also hosting). There are 18 people signed up between these meetups to also be at Sacco's at 6:00.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a blue-striped cap
item.name: Sacco's Pizza & Bar
